content.title: Archmage Interdem
content.body:
The Archmage is seldom, only appearing to say what he deems necessary.
Due to his reclusive and secretive nature, very little is known about him; but the Queen seems to trust him with her life.
Although he may not seem like it, he is also quite knowledgeable on alchemy, and even natural magic; and as such Oseille will occasionally seek his advice on certain subjects.
Though he seems more talkative with you, Adventurer. I wonder why...
